Pill Reminder Warning!! Cost and planning Help to be fit Medical note Ranking Record Hospital info and tips
You can give reminder to your medicine and can put notification for task Warning for end of medicine How much money will you need to buy your medicine and if you go outside medicine planning Updating weight,height,pressure,water level BMI and many other activity to keep you fit Take o note of medical symtomps that help in the appoinment of the doctor Ranking the medicine,doctor according to your feedback Keep record of your medical profiles Hospital info like hospital cost,location,phone number and some basic beauty and healthy tips
Skip Next Lets Get Started Sign in Email Password Sign in or register Sign in "Welcome !" Not a valid username Password must be >5 characters "Login failed" Open Navigation drawer Close Navigation drawer
How often you take the medicine Suppose you take the medicine at morning and night it means 2 times in a day.Then your schedule is 1 day and consume is 2 times. Just write the duration in days and must input as number How much in quantity you consume in your selected schedule. Suppose you have a injection which you need to take 1 time after 7 days. Then select schedule 7 and select consume 1. If you take half just input .5 Just write the consume quantity in decimal number Just write the rate in bdt . Input it as decimal number
